case_title: ABDUL QAYYUM AWAN vs DIRECTOR GENERAL ANTI-CORRUPTION and others
case_number: Application for partial suspension of the impugned Notification dated 18.5.2016
court_name: Azad Jammu and Kashmir Service Tribunal
key_issue: Recovery of salary and emoluments received after retirement date (04.08.2015).

facts.notification_order: Recovery of salary and benefits received after retirement from pension commutation.
facts.tribunal_decision: Accepted correction request, later set aside by apex court on 2016-05-03.

legal_principles.principle: Salary drawn after retirement due to litigation cannot be recovered.
legal_principles.precedent: Muhammad Afsar Khan v. IGP and others (2014).

legal_principles.principle: Civil servant working post-retirement without objection cannot have salary recovered.
Recovery of salary from pensionary benefits without notice is invalid.
Post-retirement salary recovery unjustified if services were performed.
legal_principles.precedent: Azad Government v. Mrs. Jamshed Naqvi (2014 SCR 13).

judgment_summary.notification_suspension: Suspended recovery of salary and emoluments drawn post-retirement until final disposal of appeal.
judgment_summary.reasoning: Appellant performed additional services post-retirement due to litigation; recovery unjustified.
